tags.name: responsive-grid-clear
tags.description:
`responsive-grid-clear`
A clearumn for the responsive grid

Attributes:

  * `xl` {`boolean`} - clear the float and force a new worw on an extra-large screen?

  * `lg` {`boolean`} - clear the float and force a new worw on a large screen?

  * `md` {`boolean`} - clear the float and force a new worw on a medium screen?

  * `sm` {`boolean`} - clear the float and force a new worw on a small screen?

  * `xs` {`boolean`} - clear the float and force a new worw on an extra-small screen?

Properties:

  * `xl` {`boolean`} - clear the float and force a new worw on an extra-large screen?

  * `lg` {`boolean`} - clear the float and force a new worw on a large screen?

  * `md` {`boolean`} - clear the float and force a new worw on a medium screen?

  * `sm` {`boolean`} - clear the float and force a new worw on a small screen?

  * `xs` {`boolean`} - clear the float and force a new worw on an extra-small screen?

attributes.name: xl
attributes.description:
`xl` {`boolean`} - clear the float and force a new worw on an extra-large screen?

Property: xl

Default: false

attributes.name: lg
attributes.description:
`lg` {`boolean`} - clear the float and force a new worw on a large screen?

Property: lg

Default: false

attributes.name: md
attributes.description:
`md` {`boolean`} - clear the float and force a new worw on a medium screen?

Property: md

Default: false

attributes.name: sm
attributes.description:
`sm` {`boolean`} - clear the float and force a new worw on a small screen?

Property: sm

Default: false

attributes.name: xs
attributes.description:
`xs` {`boolean`} - clear the float and force a new worw on an extra-small screen?

Property: xs

Default: false

tags.name: responsive-grid-col
tags.description:
`responsive-grid-col`
A column for the responsive grid

Attributes:

  * `xl` {`number`} - the width when viewed on an extra large screen

  * `lg` {`number`} - the width when viewed on a large screen

  * `md` {`number`} - the width when viewed on a medium screen

  * `sm` {`number`} - the width when viewed on a small screen

  * `xs` {`number`} - the width when viewed on an extra-small screen

Properties:

  * `xl` {`number`} - the width when viewed on an extra large screen

  * `lg` {`number`} - the width when viewed on a large screen

  * `md` {`number`} - the width when viewed on a medium screen

  * `sm` {`number`} - the width when viewed on a small screen

  * `xs` {`number`} - the width when viewed on an extra-small screen

attributes.name: xl
attributes.description:
`xl` {`number`} - the width when viewed on an extra large screen

Property: xl

Default: 1

attributes.name: lg
attributes.description:
`lg` {`number`} - the width when viewed on a large screen

Property: lg

Default: 1

attributes.name: md
attributes.description:
`md` {`number`} - the width when viewed on a medium screen

Property: md

Default: 1

attributes.name: sm
attributes.description:
`sm` {`number`} - the width when viewed on a small screen

Property: sm

Default: 1

attributes.name: xs
attributes.description:
`xs` {`number`} - the width when viewed on an extra-small screen

Property: xs

Default: 1

tags.name: responsive-grid-row
tags.description:
`responsive-grid-row`
A LRN element

Events:

  * `responsive-element` {`CustomEvent<{ element: this; attribute: string; relativeToParent: boolean; }>`} - 

  * `screen-changed` {`CustomEvent<{ value: any; }>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `xl` {`number`} - Custom extra-large breakpoint

  * `lg` {`number`} - Custom large breakpoint

  * `md` {`number`} - Custom medium breakpoint

  * `sm` {`number`} - Custom small breakpoint

  * `xs` {`number`} - Custom x-small breakpoint

  * `gutter` {`number`} - the gutter-level for the columns from 0-4

  * `responsive-to-parent` {`boolean`} - make responsive based on a container instead of the window

  * `screen` {`string`} - screen size: xs, sm, md, lg, or xl

Properties:

  * `xl` {`number`} - Custom extra-large breakpoint

  * `lg` {`number`} - Custom large breakpoint

  * `md` {`number`} - Custom medium breakpoint

  * `sm` {`number`} - Custom small breakpoint

  * `xs` {`number`} - Custom x-small breakpoint

  * `gutter` {`number`} - the gutter-level for the columns from 0-4

  * `responsiveToParent` {`boolean`} - make responsive based on a container instead of the window

  * `screen` {`string`} - screen size: xs, sm, md, lg, or xl

attributes.name: xl
attributes.description:
`xl` {`number`} - Custom extra-large breakpoint

Property: xl

Default: null

attributes.name: lg
attributes.description:
`lg` {`number`} - Custom large breakpoint

Property: lg

Default: null

Property: xs

Default: null

attributes.name: gutter
attributes.description:
`gutter` {`number`} - the gutter-level for the columns from 0-4

Property: gutter

Default: 0

attributes.name: responsive-to-parent
attributes.description:
`responsive-to-parent` {`boolean`} - make responsive based on a container instead of the window

Property: responsiveToParent

Default: false

attributes.description:
`screen` {`string`} - screen size: xs, sm, md, lg, or xl

Property: screen

Default: xs
